articles.title: Biden and Putin hold talks amid Russia-Ukraine tensions - BBC News
articles.description: The US and Russian leaders speak by video link, as Moscow warns tensions in Europe are "off the scale".
articles.content:
Image caption, The two men spoke by video link
US President Joe Biden has held rare talks by video link with his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin, amid tensions on Ukraine's eastern frontier.
